tabs.title: Dataset
tabs.description: Example of using a mapping table. In this case it is a mapping between Pollution class, Indoor climate class and air demand. It could also be between a fluid temperature and some fluid properties.

tabs.title: Get air demands for specific IC class at different pollution classes
tabs.description:
Example of using a mapping table. In this case it is a mapping between Pollution class, Indoor climate class and air demand. It could also be between a fluid temperature and some fluid properties.

This query returns the air demands at different pollution classes for *Indoor Climate Class B*.

tabs.title: Get air demands for specific IC class and pollution class
tabs.description:
Example of using a mapping table. In this case it is a mapping between Pollution class, Indoor climate class and air demand. It could also be between a fluid temperature and some fluid properties.

This query returns the air demand for a *Low Polluting Building* for *Indoor Climate Class B*.
